entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Factory methods to create immutable dictionary instances from dictionary expressions #114090
  • [API Proposal]: NativeTensor<T> #114089
  • PackedSimd fails to find interpreter intrinsic #114088
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.ClientModel Open Telemetry extension APIs #114084
  • Expression.TryFault returns incorrect result with return labels #114081
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.*{Hex/Base64}*(utf8) #114079
  • Performance discrepancy: Collection Expressions vs. LINQ Extension Methods #114074
  • Assertion failed 'compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(InstructionSet_SSSE3)' during 'Importation' #114072
  • Runtime projects aren't using the live portable RID graph in the build #114069
  • ClassUnloadStarted callback of ICorProfilerCallback is not called for generic class instances in different LoaderAllocator #114068
    10.0.0
  • 标题: [Bug][Linux][net8.0] Proxy CONNECT fails (407) using HTTPS_PROXY env var with credentials; No Proxy-Authorization header sent #114066
  • Covariant returns are devirtualized for interfaces but not for base classes #114065
    Future
  • [Mono]: Rare deadlock when pre-emptive suspend a thread holding look inside pthread library on Android. #114064
  • [API Proposal]: Add RSA-PSS signature validation with custom salt length OR expose RsaBcryptSafeHandle #114061
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandledTester/unhandledTester.cmd #114055
  • System.Text.Json should support has buildin support read json number to string property #114054

Closed

  • JIT: Assertion failed 'InlineeCompiler->fgFirstBB->bbWeight == 0' during 'Morph - Inlining' #114073
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add logging APIs to System.ClientModel #111046
  • `ReaderWriterLockSlim.WaitingWriteCount` returns 0 if the write lock is entering as an upgrade from `UpgradableReadLock` #107077
    10.0.0
  • New hard crash after targeting .net 9 from 8 (System.AccessViolationException) #110543
  • Segmentation fault running System.Security.Cryptography.Tests #113785
    10.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.3.25168.9] Autodesk Revit 2025 close unexpectedly after closing File > Options window #113751
  • [API Proposal]: add a flexible/polymorphic alternative of FromKeyedServicesAttribute for Controller factory #114014
  • JIT: Switch should create assertions #113992
    10.0.0
  • CreateAppHost task fails with very long path #39211
  • Moving target framework parsing to runtime #39885
  • Lack of runtime judgment error #41203
  • Exception thrown (but caught) when reading ExpandoObject property; affects performance #41873
  • How to get metadatatoken from address of MethodDesc. #114053

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][interpreter] Make nint and nuint work for interpreter simd intrinsics #114087
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • ML-KEM: PKCS#8 Import #114086
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [cDAC] Support passing global string values #114085
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • HTTP/3: Eliminate near-zero "wait for connection" telemetry signals #114083
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [TEST] Async2 with variants turned off #114082
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, runtime-async
  • [browser] profilers linking and instrumentation in AOT #114080
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [debugger] Fix debugging a x86 app in mixed mode #114078
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] [debugger] Fix debugging a x86 app in mixed mode #114077
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [debugger] Fix debugging a x86 app in mixed mode #114075
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [S.T.J] Removed unused field in JsonProperty #114071
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm][interp] Try out a few more matches for the intrinsics #114070
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add support for `.vtfixup` in ILC #114067
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • SLH-DSA implementation for OpenSSL #114060
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • TypeDefinitionDocument documentation #103135
    area-Meta
  • Followon changes from code review comments in the Monitor HMF removal change #113857
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Fix improperly contained BroadcastScalarToVector(CreateScalar(GT_LONG)) #113994
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Always set block weight during method entry canonicalization #114076
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ML-KEM: Contract Tests #114051
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Include in WaitingWriteCount the thread that may be waiting in upgradable mode #113982
    area-System.Threading
  • [RISC-V] Fix Windows build #114062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove dead code #113852
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixed some typos in the document: Implementation of Hardware Intrinsics in CoreCLR #113228
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #113975
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono] Missing memory barrier leads to crash in multi-threaded scenarios #113740
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.5
  • Fix propagating of unhandled exception to native caller #113980
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Enable more constant foldings for switch ops using assertions #113998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix EH and stack walking on linux-x86 #113972
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Test failure - SendAsync_RequestVersion20_ResponseVersion20 #113648
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • Make COR_PRF_DISABLE_OPTIMIZATIONS Allowable After Attach and non immutable #113924
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove reference / redistribution of externally provided packages in MSBuild tasks #113404
    area-Build-mono
  • Draft : Reduce TP regression in allocateRegistersMinimal() #113988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • TypeMap API (Dynamic implementation) #113954
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #99136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Stackwalk support for interpreted frames #113900
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic div… #113286
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Sign and harden pkgs #114027
    needs-area-label
  • Reimplement PR 112032, preserve trailing extra data when updating ZIP files #113306
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [RuntimeAsync] Move runtime async to the main repo #113976
    new-api-needs-documentation, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • Improve error handling of unknown arch #114046
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Block inlines with different exception wrapping behavior #113849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ZipArchive loop condition for reading central directory headers #114023
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [cDAC] Adds DAC like entrypoint with new COM interface #113899
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113977
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Remove superfluous modifiers from contract interfaces #113983
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • remove the switch to fallback to old EH #114018
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Fix R2R files doublemap on UNIX #113082
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Propagate flow into finally regions correctly in synthesis #114016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enhance logging of stubs through the PerfMap on Linux #113943
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Replace `Unsafe.As` with `Unsafe.Read{Write}Unaligned` #113293
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Increase `runtime-coreclr libraries-pgo` timeout #113942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Parallel change to the diagnostic update for GC Info decoder. #113888
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] event pipe - JavaScript part #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Add field access support to CoreCLR Interpreter #114049
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • JIT: Shrink data for scalar instructions with contained const vectors #114040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix crossgen2 sometimes emitting tokens from the wrong module into R2R output #114029
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Make lttng-ust an optional dependency. #113876
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Simple math intrinsics #113689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Add morphing to LE_UN/GT_UN(expr, uint.MaxValue) (dotnet#76525) #113037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Allow using ldsflda on initonly fields outside of cctor #112081
    area-Tools-ILVerification, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Cleanup some unused code and signature #112905
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix build with enabled FEATURE_ENABLE_NO_ADDRESS_SPACE_RANDOMIZATION #112689
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono]: Fix syslog format error on Windows. #114009
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Apple mobile] Enable trimming on build machines to match ILLink features #113466
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.x
  • [mono] [hotreload] Adjust row_size and size_bitfield from the baseline based on the delta sizes #113995
    area-EnC-mono
  • Deduplicate base interfaces from another assembly in COM generator #111931
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Adjust additional source under utilcode and vm to use minipal_log API. #113916
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Delete OSX libmsquic transport nuget package #111557
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WinHTTP] Certificate caching on WinHttpHandler to eliminate extra call to Custom Certificate Validation #111791
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Don't use `Delegate.Method` in ServiceDescriptor #114008
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 134.0.6998.165, windows: 135.0.7049.41 #114042
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Document important nuances about Dictionary/HashSet #112760
    area-System.Collections
